title: MacOS High Sierra/Sierra
body: I've played league for about 2 years now, and have been on MacOS Sierra. Everything ran fine, very little lag and normal ping. Recently, I updated to High Sierra, in which it made every game I play lag and all the websites 10x slower. I decided to downgrade back to Sierra, but league is still as laggy and impossible to enjoy, including the client. Everything is incredibly slow. I've changed all the settings and at this point I don't know what to do. Help?

replies.body: Yikes it sounds like something pretty hefty might be going on with your OS at this point =\ . I'm not personally the best with Mac's, but I have heard from the techs that El Capitan or Sierra might be the best for League/more stable right now? You may need to reinstall your OS if it's running slow all around, since troubleshooting League won't help much if the entire system is slow =(.
Its been 6 months since high Sierra, still this problem persists...you'd think riot would get on their shit by now

HOMMIE IM ON A MISSION! I HAD THE SAME PROBLEM i found out a solution!

 2 things i did tha helped IMMENSELY 

1. i turned my double click in my accessibility setting under mouse and keyboard in syst pref. to FASTER this helps finder out.
2. i DISABLED my icloud and signed out.... this slows ur comp down MASSIVELY because im pretty sure with high sierra theres ALOT of bugs in icloud this made my comp feel amost faster then regular sierra my guess its the icloud. i had my whole system trying to load 43 gigs for 3 days i left it on and just cut my losses and turned off icloud make sure u back up ur info! hope this helps man! 

also i did all this in safe mode on my computer to speed up the proceess. if you dont know how to boot in safe just hold shift when u start ur computer up before the apple logo! 

peace love and wombo combos <3
